author: mbluj
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces phase-2 specific part of the L1 OMTF emulator. It is build on top of phase1 OMTF emulator refactored in #43687. 
Changes by this PR are added in a new CMSSW package named `L1Trigger/L1TMuonOverlapPhase2`.

This PR adds currently non-present dependency of #44498.

FYI, @kbunkow, @akalinow, @aloeliger

#### PR validation:

Tested with matrix tests (limited set) and by the L1T software team during integration with the so-called "L1T integration branch": https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1196

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of this PR is not expected unless explicitly requested by the L1T team (backport to 14_0 could be possible).
title: Phase2 OMTF emulator
